mapper.select: SELECT ALBUM_ID as albumId, SONG_NAME as songName FROM ( SELECT * FROM SONG ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT SONG_NAME as songName, SONG_ID as songId, ARTIST.ARTIST_NAME as artistName, ALBUM.ALBUM_NAME as albumName FROM ( SELECT SONG_ID, SONG_NAME, ARTIST_ID, ALBUM_ID FROM SONG ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) SONG JOIN ARTIST ON SONG.ARTIST_ID = ARTIST.ARTIST_ID JOIN ALBUM ON SONG.ALBUM_ID = ALBUM.ALBUM_ID WHERE ROWNUM <= 6

SELECT USER_LIKE.ALBUM_ID as albumId, ALBUM.ALBUM_NAME as albumName, SONG.SONG_NAME as songName FROM ( SELECT ALBUM_ID, SONG_ID FROM USER_LIKE ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) USER_LIKE JOIN ALBUM ON USER_LIKE.ALBUM_ID = ALBUM.ALBUM_ID JOIN SONG ON USER_LIKE.SONG_ID = SONG.SONG_ID WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT S.SONG_NAME AS songName, AR.ARTIST_NAME AS artistName, AL.ALBUM_NAME AS albumName, S.SONG_ID AS songId, S.ALBUM_ID AS albumId, S.ARTIST_ID AS artistId FROM SONG S, ALBUM AL, ARTIST AR, NOW_CHART NC WHERE S.ARTIST_ID = AR.ARTIST_ID AND S.ALBUM_ID = AL.ALBUM_ID AND NC.SONG_ID = S.SONG_ID AND ROWNUM <= 8 ORDER BY NC.COUNT_CHART DESC
